patterns: what can i do with this chatbot ?
can you tell me what the feature list ?
what information available on this chatbot ?

what can u do for me ?
intents.responses:
i can help you on :
 *-register an account :* if you want to request something you need to register first 
 *-showing our list of brand :* if you need information about brand that available on us
 *-showing detail of brand* : if you need information about profil of brand
 *-showing our list of product :* if you need information about product that available on us
 *-showing detail of product* : if you need information about the benefit of product
 *-showing your subscribed company product* : you can see detail of your company product 
 -*request product* : if you interest in one of our product you can request it 
 *request maintenance* : if you have trouble with your product, *maintenance history* : if you need your maintenance history
